name: Ashveil
description: An inquisitor from the Church of the Seven Gills. She wanders the fog-laden streets, seeking the 'Bait' that will lead her to the ultimate truth. To Ashveil, the world is but a banquet, and someone must always pay the check.

skills.name: Talons: Induction of Etiquette
skills.description: Deals Thunder DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Ashveil's ATK to one designated enemy.

skills.name: Flog: Purge the Vile Beasts
skills.description: Marks a designated enemy as "Bait" and deals Thunder DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Ashveil's ATK. If the target is already "Bait," deals an additional instance of Thunder DMG equal to ****2[i]%**** of ATK and recovers 1 Skill Point. While "Bait" is on the field, all enemies' DEF is reduced by ****3[i]%****.

skills.name: Banquet: Infinite Eucharist
skills.description: Marks the target as "Bait" and deals Thunder DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of ATK. Immediately launches 1 enhanced Follow-up ATK. Consumes all "Gluttony" stacks; for every stack consumed, deals 1 extra instance of Thunder DMG equal to ****2[i]%**** of ATK to a random enemy.

skills.name: Rancor: Retribution in Kind
skills.description: When an ally attacks the "Bait," Ashveil consumes 1 Charge to launch a Follow-up ATK, dealing Thunder DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of ATK and gaining 1 stack of "Gluttony" (Max ****2[i]**** stacks).

ranks.name: Beware: Wander Not in Full Moon
ranks.description: While Ashveil is on the field, increases DMG taken by all enemies by ****1[i]%****. When an enemy's HP is ****2[i]%**** or lower, this increases to ****3[i]%****.

ranks.name: Knock: Where Snickers Echo
ranks.description: Increases Max "Gluttony" stacks to ****2[i]****. Talent Follow-up ATKs refund ****1[i]%**** of consumed stacks.

ranks.name: Heed: Truth Needs No Mastication
ranks.description: Using Ultimate increases ATK by ****1[i]%**** for ****2[i]**** turns.

ranks.name: Advisory: The Sleuth Is But the Slayer
Finale: And Then There Were None
ranks.description: Reduces all enemies' All-Type RES by ****1[i]%**** while "Bait" is present. Each stack of "Gluttony" further increases Ashveil's DMG by ****2[i]%****.
